alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Cheshire; Merrimack; Southern Carroll; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 11:09PM EST until January 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills 20 to 30 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and southern New Hampshire and western Maine. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Plan on slippery road conditions on Monday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Cheshire; Merrimack; Southern Carroll; Western And Central Hillsborough
